Entries.Aguar: I'm truly grateful for this gift./62 225 107 118/This is adequate, thank you./768 769 130 258/I find this rather unpleasant./266/This is atrocious./82/I guess I'll use this for an experiment later.../-4/
Entries.Alissa: I love this! Thank you so much, @!/211 276 60 398/I like this, thanks!/22 68 400 613/I'm sorry but I'm not fond of thise.//What are you doing! Get that away from me!//Oh, you're giving me this? Thanks @./-4/
Entries.Bert: Wow! You're really giving me this? Thanks a bunch!/207 336 72 645/Thanks for the gift @!/86 284 270 280/What? Is this a prank?//Are you trying to get me killed!?//Oh a gift, Thank you, @./-4/
Entries.Corine: Oh wow, @! This is wonderful! Thank you!/591 227 196 340/This is a nice gift. Thanks!/280 398 638 254/Eww, what's that?//Uh, please don't.//Oh wow, a gift huh? Thanks, @./-4/
Entries.Ezekiel: What!? I love this! Thanks a bunch!/198 386 190 129/This is nice, I guess. Thanks./78 403 24 192/Are you mocking me?//What!? Wait till I get my hands on you!//What am I supposed to do with this?/-4/
Entries.Flor: This one of my favorite things! Thank you!/253 64 268 233/I like this. Thank you!/260 412 22 418/I... Uh... I don't really like this.//Are you... Are you bullying me?//Uh... Thank you I suppose.../-4/
Entries.Freddie: This is a wonderful gift, adventurer. I am truly grateful./236 278 86 20/This is a good gift. Thank you./380 396 348 252/I don't like this, adventurer.//Are you trying to make an enemy out of me?//Thank you for the gift, @./-4/
Entries.Ian: This is great! Thank you, @. Really!/233 213 272 400/This is useful. Thanks a lot!/403 24 812 397/Giving this to someone is kind of mean.//Okay, wow. This isn't funny. Please leave me alone.//I guess this is a gift? Thanks./-4/
Entries.Jeric: Whoa! This is great! Thanks a lot!/637 224 444 597/This is a nice gift, @. Thanks!/20 335 266 408/Sorry, but I don't like this.//Uh, is this a joke? Really funny, @...//This is alright, I guess./-4/
Entries.Jio: You know what I desire? I'm honored./604/Thank you, kind stranger./406/Please leave.//Do you have a deathwish, stranger?//Hmm.../-4/
Entries.Keahi: Awesome, @! This is awesome! Thanks!/223 224 372 282/Nice gift, @! Thanks a lot!/396 404 567 430/Ew! What's that!?//Yuck! I hate this!//Hey! I can use this for target practice, I think... Thanks!/-4/
Entries.Kenneth: Wow! I've been looking for one of these! Thank you!/206 400 338 576/This is a nice gift, @. Thank you./90 184 395 538/I don't like this at all, @?//Please don't give me your trash.//Oh? Thank you, I think.../-4/
Entries.Kiwi: Kiwi love this! Kiwi like you! Thank you!/268/Kiwi like this. Shee!/-4/Kiwi not like this. Shoo!//Kiwi hate this! Kiwi hate @. KIWI STAB!//For Kiwi? Why?//
Entries.Lenny: I love this! Thank you, @! This brings a smile to my face!/235 260 416 573/This is a nice gift, @. Thank you./400 376 264 196/I don't like this, @. I'm sorry.//Why would any sane person want this as a gift?//I'll... Uh... put it somewhere safe. Thanks./-4/
Entries.Lola: This is very lovely gift, dear. Thank you./230 64 241 306/Oh, I like this!/769 107 454 575/I accept... reluctantly, @.//You know. Giving someone this constitutes a war declaration in some cultures...//Thanks, I guess./-4/
Entries.Maddie: Oh! Is that? I love this! I mean... Thanks./196 611 393 586/I like this! Thank you./82 418 283 284/Please don't bother me.//This is awful. You're awful!//Uh, thanks, I guess./-4/
Entries.Olga: Oh dear! Thank you so much!/212 348 376 188/Thank you, @. This is nice./184 22 281 402/What in Yoba's name is this?//Why would you give me this? Are you trying to be mean?//Thanks, I suppose.../-4/
Entries.Philip: Hey, this is awesome! Thanks, @!/219 86 264 591/Nice gift, @. Thank you./80 223 350 157/No, thank you...//Oh Yoba, I hate this so much.//Thank you, @./-4/
Entries.Pika: Mahalo! Thank you! This is a favorite of mine!/733 60 342 350/This is a nice gift, @. Thanks./157 346 419 246/I don't think so, @.//This is weliweli. This is horrible!//Thanks for this, @./-4/
Entries.Richard: Splendid gift, @! I'm humbled by your generosity. Thank you!/72 218 348 604/Hmm, a quality gift. Thank you./386 86 552 303/Not really my taste, @.//How repulsive!//Oh? What do I do with this? Thanks, I guess./-4/
Entries.Shiro: I didn't expect this! I'll cherish this forever. Thank you!/414 241 610 420/You're so kind. Thanks!/424 190 399 304/I dislike this.//I hate this. Sorry, but I really do.//Uh, thank you?/-4/
Entries.Trinnie: This is great! Thank you, @!!/233 797 211 221/I like this gift! Thank you!/591 22 428 400/Ah! I don't like this!//Ewww! I hate this!//Uh.... What do you want me to do with this?/-4/
Entries.Ysabelle: This is just delightful, @! Thank you!/72 228 268 636/Thank you, that's generous of you./348 340 421 258/Ew, get that away from me.//I hate this. Please leave me alone.//Oh, thank you, @./-4/
Entries.Yuuma: Thank you, @! Thanks for thinking of me!/194 613 398 216/This is great! Thanks!/167 176 92 311/I don't like this, @.//I'm telling my brother! You're rude!//Thanks.../-4/
